mapper.select: SELECT s.no, s.name, s.school_name AS schoolName, s.school_grade AS schoolGrade, s.birthdate, s.gender, s.student_cellphone AS studentCellphone, s.parent_cellphone AS parentCellphone, s.comments, s.teacher_no AS teacherNo, u.name AS teacherName FROM students s LEFT JOIN users u ON s.teacher_no = u.no ORDER BY s.no DESC

SELECT s.no, s.name, s.school_name AS schoolName, s.school_grade AS schoolGrade, s.birthdate, s.gender, s.student_cellphone AS studentCellphone, s.parent_cellphone AS parentCellphone, s.comments, s.teacher_no AS teacherNo, u.name AS teacherName FROM students s LEFT JOIN users u ON s.teacher_no = u.no WHERE s.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (name, school_name, school_grade, birthdate, gender, student_cellphone, parent_cellphone, comments, teacher_no) VALUES (#{name}, #{schoolName}, ${schoolGrade}, #{birthdate}, #{gender}, #{studentCellphone}, #{parentCellphone}, #{comments}, #{teacherNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET name=#{name}, school_name=#{schoolName}, school_grade=#{schoolGrade}, birthdate=#{birthdate}, gender=#{gender}, student_cellphone=#{studentCellphone}, parent_cellphone=#{parentCellphone}, comments=#{comments}, teacher_no=#{teacherNo} WHERE no=#{no}
